recommendations: Katrina Savarino ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of having Jo as my manager during her tenure at IDGA. During that time, I found Jo to be hardworking, dedicated and very driven. She was extremely motivating and helpful when I had questions or issues arise, but would also stand back and let me try new ideas without micromanaging me. I would highly recommend her for any position that she went after.‚Äù

Daniel S. ‚ÄúI worked with Jo for five years. We started as trainees together and progressed to management around the same time. Jo is a marketing machine. She seems to have the ability to be creative, engaging and persuasive, all the while being twice as productive as anyone else. As a manager, she lead from the front, and many of those that worked for her have gone on to become well-rounded marketers in their own right - a sign they learnt from one of the best‚Äù
